response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This unique offering has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and comes with a wealth of features designed to enhance your experience. Given its exceptional quality and versatility, we believe it's worth more than $12,000 to you. I am offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $15,000. This exclusive opportunity allows you to enjoy all its benefits without the usual market premiums.
